Package de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Class DependentLineObjectToPointCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentGuiObjectCV
      • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentLineObjectToPointCV
  • public class DependentLineObjectToPointCV
extends DependentGuiObjectCV
    This class is used to specify lines that shall be drawn between two objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV. An object of class DependendGuiObjectCV can be registered with exactly two AnimatedGuiObjectCV objects. After this registration, the endpoints of the line will always coincide with the centers of the two objects, i.e. the line will always graphically connect the objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DependentLineObjectToPointCV​(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj, android.graphics.Point point, android.graphics.Paint paint)
      Constructor to initialize the attributes and to register the newly created object with the AnimatedGuiObjectCV object that is one endpoint of the new line

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Method to draw a line between the current center of guiobj and the fixed point. This method will be called automatically by the draw() methods of all AnimatedGuiObjectsCV where this object is registered.
        Specified by:
        draw in class DependentGuiObjectCV
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to draw on

      • onDeregisteredFromGuiObject

        public void onDeregisteredFromGuiObject​(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj)
        Method called from the removeDependentGuiObject() of the AnimatedGuiObjectCV where this object was registered. Will do nothing because there is no other object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV involved.
        Specified by:
        onDeregisteredFromGuiObject in class DependentGuiObjectCV
        Parameters:
        guiobj - The object from where this method is called.
